title: Bodoni looking serif from Cadillac website
author: umlautthoni

comments.content:
It should be a Didot of some sort.

- Lex

Lex is right on the mark.

Specifically, it appears to be Emigre’s take on a Didot, called Filosofia (Unicase Caps, in this instance):  
 [http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=97](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041217/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=97 "http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=97")
We have a winner! Thank you very much, Lex for identifying the correct typeface and thank you, K.C. for the link!
